net.librec.recommender.cf.rating

Class AspectModelRecommender

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.librec.recommender.AbstractRecommender
      • net.librec.recommender.ProbabilisticGraphicalRecommender
        • net.librec.recommender.cf.rating.AspectModelRecommender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Recommender

    public class AspectModelRecommender
extends ProbabilisticGraphicalRecommender

    Latent class models for collaborative filtering

    This implementation refers to the method proposed by Thomas et al. at IJCAI 1999.

    Tempered EM: Thomas Hofmann, Latent class models for collaborative filtering , IJCAI. 1999, 99: 688-693.

    Author:
    guoguibin and Haidong Zhang

      • predict

        protected double predict(int userIdx,
             int itemIdx)
                  throws LibrecException
        Description copied from class: AbstractRecommender
        predict a specific rating for user userIdx on item itemIdx, note that the prediction is not bounded. It is useful for building models with no need to bound predictions.
        Specified by:
        predict in class AbstractRecommender
        Parameters:
        userIdx - user index
        itemIdx - item index
        Returns:
        predictive rating for user userIdx on item itemIdx without bound
        Throws:
        LibrecException - if error occurs during predicting
